MajorClaims.Text: governments should help and encourage artists to continue their work

Claims.Text: art is a very valuable object for every country and the talent in this area cannot be discovered everywhere
culture and history of a country can be reserved and assured by art
talent in art is extremely precious and should not be wasted

Premises.Text: art helps to improve the quality of our lives as well as attracting tourists
monuments that represent each city do not only illustrate the city's history and culture, but also make the city more beautiful and an attractive place for tourists
some countries depend on tourism as their main source of revenue
their work crafts are very necessary to boost the tourist industry
sculptures and paintings in the museums and art galleries generally reflect the culture and civilization of every generation
Young people are also able to get more knowledge about their country's history and culture by observing various work crafts
not many people are blessed in the talent of paintings and work crafts
this type of talent has to be valued as other types of talents such as talent in science or literature
